name: The One Room
description:
You are the hero of a very small world. There are shopkeepers who exist only to help you, and an endless supply of monsters to be a hero against! 

Made for the #1RoomRPG Game jam this capsule RPG is a grind-fest and a loot-fest. 

This game does not use all original assets, but it does have a good deal of content for such a small space, approximately two and a half hours. Play it in the browser or download it for the ability to save your progress.

 I hope you enjoy this game as much as I enjoyed making it!
